place.name: COTON IN THE ELMS
place.gazetteerText: COTON-IN-THE-ELMS, a chapelry in Lullington parish, Derby; 5 miles SW of Burton-upon-Trent. Real property, £2, 636. Pop., 353. The living was separated from Lullington in 1868, and is a vicarage. Value, £88.* (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
